ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.title: Powering Up![--充电!--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests0.de: &bReaper Generators&r are a very unique way of both &6generating FE&r and &6killing mobs&r.[--&b收割发电机&r是既能&6产生FE&r又能&6击杀怪物&r的一种非常独特的机器.--]
Put in some &6Soul Catalysts&r, and it will start dealing damage to the surrounding mobs.[--放置一些&6灵魂催化剂&r,它会开始对周围的生物造成伤害.--]
There are also multiple upgrade &6Runes&r that will enhance its effects:[--还有多个升级&6符文&r可以增强它的效果:--]
&aDilato Rune&r - Increase range[--&aDilato Rune&r - 增加作用范围--]
&4Humano Rune&r - Get energy from hurting players[--&4Humano Rune&r - 伤害玩家获得能量--]
&6Reficiat Rune&r - Increase efficiency[--&6Refiat Rune&r - 提高效率--]
&bSpiritus Rune&r - Give player-kill drops instead of FE[--&bSpiritus Rune&r - 产出由FE变为玩家击杀掉落物--]
&fVelocitas Rune&r - Decrease cooldown[--&fVelocitas Rune&r - 减少冷却时间--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests1.de: Very basic starter source of FE. It works and can be automated but it takes a bit of work to fully automate and is a relatively low power source.[--非常基础的FE初始资源。它能自动化工作，但是想要完全自动化还是需要一些工作，并且是一个非常低效的产能来源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.ti: New Age of Electricity[--电力新时代--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.su: Magnets, how do they work!?[--磁铁,它们如何运作?--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.de: Welcome to Create: New Age! With this mod you'll be able to turn rotational energy into Forge Energy (FE). To accomplish this you need to place a generator coil surrounded by magnetic blocks. [--欢迎来到机械动力: 新世代!你可以使用这个模组，将能源转化为Forge Energy(FE).你需要将磁铁方块放到发动机线圈周围。--]

The strength of the magnetic force is tiered to different magnets and will improve the output of your generator coils when you are able to upgrade to better magnets. Once you've surrounded your generator coil with magnets you apply a carbon brush to it and a source of SU. This will cause the coil to spin and generate energy. [--根据磁力的强度分级为不同的磁铁,升级更高级的磁铁,将提高发电机线圈的输出功率。用磁铁包住发电机线圈，放上碳刷并使用应力驱动。线圈将旋转并产生能量。--]

The faster you are able to spin the generator, the more FE it will generate. Higher tier magnets provide more resistance however and require greater amounts of SU to operate. You can stack up to 8 coils in a line in this way and extract power from them all at once.[--发电机旋转得越快,产生的FE就越多。但更高等级的磁铁有更大的阻力,需要更多的应力驱动。最多可以这样堆叠8个线圈,一起发电。--]
